Title: All Must Be Loved
Writer: David Hollander, Ann Biderman (created by), Gina Welch (staff writer), Lenore Zion (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Ray meets Father Romero to confront him about his past. Bridget makes a move on her new crush. Rays deal with Paige Finney become more complicated.
